places.name: Latacunga Municipal Building
places.description: The main municipal government building featuring historic architecture and serving as an important administrative center in the city.

places.name: Cotopaxi Culture House (CCE)
places.description: The leading cultural institution in Cotopaxi, offering art exhibitions, theater performances, workshops, and community events.

places.name: ESPE Latacunga University
places.description: A campus of the ESPE Armed Forces University, recognized for its academic excellence, innovation, and technological development.

places.name: Poultier Mills (Molinos Poultier)
places.description: A historic mill complex that represents Latacunga’s industrial roots and its historical contribution to local agriculture.

places.name: Vicente León Park
places.description: The city's central park, surrounded by colonial landmarks and a vibrant local atmosphere. A popular spot for gatherings and recreation.

places.name: Cotopaxi Volcano National Park
places.description: A world-famous national park home to the Cotopaxi Volcano, offering breathtaking landscapes, hiking routes, and protected wildlife.

places.name: Quilotoa Lagoon
places.description: A stunning turquoise crater lake known for its dramatic views, cultural surroundings, and outdoor adventure opportunities.

places.name: Hacienda La Ciénega
places.description: A historic colonial hacienda converted into a boutique hotel, offering elegant architecture and deep cultural heritage.
